languages.text:
"Дому Орселлио не стоит знать о том, что здесь происходит. Навигаторы и без того напуганы его силой: во время последнего эксперимента трое из клана Сеттала полностью утратили разум. Пустые оболочки не принесут славы ни Дому Орселлио, ни его младшей ветви... Будем продолжать.
***
Наконец-то удалось вживить артефакт тем, кто смог совладать с его силой. Быть может, навигаторы, сгоравшие в агонии от нестерпимого потока энергии, были лишь свидетельством нашего упадка. Я устала считать погибших. Слабым не место среди тех, кто обуздал мощь Атласа. Их способности возросли многократно, не говоря о том, насколько проще стало их контролировать и противостоять разрушительному влиянию варпа.
***
Все или ничего. Сегодня мои изыскания завершатся, и Атлас звездных путей примет финальную форму! Клан Сеттала уже перенес операцию, осталась... я сама. Атлас, что управляет всеми... Сегодня я стану величайшим новатором Дома Орселлио — или сгину навеки.
***
Эта мощь ни с чем не сравнима. Одного желания оказалось достаточно, чтобы несчастные Сеттала пали бездыханными. Будто второе сердце бьется в груди и подчиняет всех, кто способен его касаться. Как жаль, что на самом деле эта власть распространяется лишь на навигаторов Орселлио, принявших частичку Атласа. Отныне все дети, проходящие инициацию, будут получать ее. И тогда никто не сравнится с нашим величием".

traits.locale_text:
"Дому Орселлио не стоит знать о том, что здесь происходит. Навигаторы и без того напуганы его силой: во время последнего эксперимента трое из клана Сеттала полностью утратили разум. Пустые оболочки не принесут славы ни дому Орселлио, ни его младшей ветви… Будем продолжать.
***
Наконец-то удалось вживить артефакт тем, кто смог совладать с его силой. Быть может, Навигаторы, сгоравшие в агонии от нестерпимого потока энергии, были лишь свидетельством нашего упадка. Я устала считать погибших. Слабым не место среди тех, кто обуздал мощь Атласа. Их способности возросли многократно, не говоря о том, насколько проще стало их контролировать и противостоять разрушительному влиянию варпа.
***
Все или ничего. Сегодня мои изыскания завершатся, и Атлас звездных путей примет финальную форму! Клан Сеттала уже перенес операцию, осталась… я сама. Атлас, что управляет всеми… Сегодня я стану величайшим новатором Дома Орселлио — или сгину навеки.
***
Эта мощь ни с чем не сравнима. Одного желания оказалось достаточно, чтобы несчастные Сеттала пали бездыханными. Будто второе сердце бьется в груди и подчиняет всех, кто способен его касаться. Как жаль, что на самом деле эта власть распространяется лишь на Навигаторов Орселлио, принявших частичку Атласа. Отныне все дети, проходящие инициацию, будут получать ее. И тогда никто не сравнится с нашим величием".

languages.text:
"House Orsellio need not know what is taking place here. The Navigators are frightened enough by its power as it is. The last experiment left three from the Setthala clan without a shred of reason. Empty shells will bring no glory to House Orsellio or its lesser branch... We shall carry on.
***
At last, we have managed to implant the artefact in subjects who can wield its power. Perhaps all the Navigators who perished in the agonising torrent of energy were merely a symptom of our decline. I am tired of counting the dead. The weak have no place among those who have harnessed the Atlas. Their abilities have grown manifold and become significantly easier to control and more effective at resisting the ruinous influence of the warp.
***
It is all or nothing. Today is the day when my work is completed and the Starway Atlas takes its final form! The Setthalas have already undergone the operation, all that's left is... me. The Atlas that controls them all... Today, I become the greatest Novator in the history of House Orsellio — or I turn to nothing.
***
This power is beyond compare. All it took was a whim to make the wretched Setthalas fall dead at my feet. It is as if I have a second heart beating in my chest, subjugating any with the ability to touch it. How regrettable it is that this power only extends to those Orsellio Navigators who have accepted a piece of the Atlas within themselves. From now on, all children will be gifted with one at their initiation. And there will be no one who can match our greatness."

"House Orsellio need not know of what takes place here. The Navigator are frightened by its power as it is. The last experiment left three from the Setthala clan without a shred of reason. Empty shells will bring no glory to House Orsellio or its lesser branch... We shall carry on.
***
At last, we have managed to implant the artefact in subjects who can wield its forces. Perhaps all the Navigators who perished in the agonising torrent of energy were merely a symptom of our decline. I am tired of counting the dead. The weak have no place among those who have harnessed the Atlas. Their abilities have grown manifold and become significantly easier to control and more effective at resisting the ruinous influence of the warp.
***

The Atlas that controls them all... Today, I become the greatest Novator in the history of House Orsellio — or turn to nothing.
***
This power is beyond compare. All it took was a whim to make the wretched Setthalas fall before me, breathless. It is like I have a second heart beating in my chest, subjugating any with the ability to touch it. How regrettable it is that this power only extends to those Orsellio Navigators who have accepted a piece of the Atlas within. From now on, all children will be gifted with one at their initiation. And there will be no one who could match our greatness."

languages.text:
« La maison Orsellio doit savoir ce qui se passe ici. Les navigateurs craignent déjà son pouvoir, il est inutile d'en rajouter. La précédente expérience a coûté la santé mentale de trois membres du clan Setthala. Ce ne sont pas des coquilles vides qui vont contribuer à la gloire de la maison ou de sa branche mineure... Nous devons persévérer.
***
Enfin, nous avons réussi à implanter l'artefact dans des sujets capables d'employer son pouvoir. Il est possible que tous les navigateurs qui ont succombé au terrible déferlement d'énergie n'aient été qu'un symptôme de notre déclin. J'en ai plus qu'assez de compter les morts. Les faibles n'ont pas leur place parmi les détenteurs du pouvoir de l'Atlas. Leurs capacités se sont démultipliées, elles sont devenues beaucoup plus faciles à contrôler et permettent de mieux résister à l'influence néfaste du Warp.
***
Tout se jouera ici. En ce jour, je parachèverai mon œuvre et l'Atlas des étoiles prendra sa forme ultime ! Les Setthala ont déjà subi l'opération, il ne reste plus que... moi. L'Atlas pour les contrôler tous... En ce jour, je deviendrai la plus grande Novator de l'histoire des Orsellio... ou je serai réduite à néant.
***
Ce pouvoir est incommensurable. Il a suffi d'une simple pensée pour que ces misérables Setthala s'effondrent à mes pieds, morts. C'est comme si un deuxième cœur battait dans ma poitrine, subjuguant tous ceux ayant la capacité de le toucher. Quel dommage que ce pouvoir ne puisse s'appliquer qu'aux navigateurs des Orsellio qui ont reçu en eux un fragment de l'Atlas. À compter d'aujourd'hui, tous les enfants s'en verront offrir un au début de leur initiation. Alors, plus rien ni personne ne pourra contester notre suprématie. »

languages.text:
「オーセリオ家が、ここで何が起きているのかを知る必要はない。航宙士たちはその力に十分怯えている。前回の実験では、セッタラ家から3人が理性のかけらもなく去った。空っぽの殻が、オーセリオ家や、その分家に栄光をもたらすことはない…とにかく続けるのだ。
***
ついに、その力を行使できる被験者にアーティファクトを移植することに成功した。エネルギーの奔流に巻き込まれて死んだ航宙士たちは、おそらく我々の衰退の徴候に過ぎなかったのであろう。死者を数えるのはうんざりだ。アトラスを利用した者、つまり弱者に居場所などない。彼らの能力は多様化し、制御が容易になり、<歪み>の破滅的な影響に抵抗する効果も高まった。
***
全か無なのだ。今日は自分の任務が完了し、スターウェイ・アトラスが最終的な形をとる日だ！セッタラ家の者たちはすでに手術を受け、残すは…私だけだ。全てを支配するアトラス…今日、私はオーセリオ家の歴史上最も偉大なノベイターとなる。そうでなければ、私は無に帰すだろう。
***
このパワーは比較にならない。私の足元で惨めなセッタラ家の者たちを死に至らしめたのは、単なる気まぐれだけだった。まるで私の胸の中で第二の心臓が鼓動しているかのようであり、その心臓に触れる能力を持つ者を服従させる。残念なことに、この力はアトラスの一部を受け入れたオーセリオの航宙士にしか及ばない。これからは、すべての子どもたちが入門時にアトラスを授かることになる。そして、我々の偉大さに匹敵する者は誰もいなくなるだろう」

I am tired of counting the dead. The weak have no place among those who have harnessed the Atlas. Their abilities have grown manifold and become significantly easier to control and more effective at resisting the ruinous influence of the warp.

It is all or nothing. Today is the day when my work is completed and the Starway Atlas takes its final form! The Setthalas have already undergone the operation, all that's left is... me. The Atlas that controls them all... Today, I become the greatest Novator in the history of House Orsellio — or I turn to nothing.
***
This power is beyond compare. All it took was a whim to make the wretched Setthalas fall dead at my feet. It is as if I have a second heart beating in my chest, subjugating any with the ability to touch it. How regrettable it is that this power only extends to those Orsellio Navigators who have accepted a piece of the Atlas within themselves. From now on, all children will be gifted with one at their initiation. And there will be no one who can match our greatness."

languages.text:
“奥赛罗家族不需要了解这里发生过的事情，所有导航者都被它的力量吓坏了。最后的这场试验，三个来自塞塔拉氏族的人毫无理由地丧了命。不过，死人是无法为奥赛罗家族带来荣耀的……我们必须继续下去。
***
到了最后，我们成功地将那件造物植入了能够驾驭力量的人身上。无数导航者在痛苦的能量洪流中丧生，或许这些人的死亡是我们家族衰落的预兆。我已经懒得再数死了多少人，我们必将成为圣仪的主人，那些弱者在我们之中没有立足之地。至于那些成功驾驭圣仪的人，他们各个方面的能力都得到了强化。他们对力量的掌控变得更加出色，对亚空间邪恶力量的抗性也变得更强。
***
孤注一掷的时候到了，成败在此一举。我的工作终于完成了，今天就是群星圣仪诞生的日子！塞塔拉氏族的人已经完成了手术，接下来就只剩下……我自己了。我的圣仪将会控制所有的圣仪……今天，我会成为奥赛罗家族有史以来最伟大的大族长……又或许，所有的努力都会功败垂成。
***
这样的力量实在是无可比拟，只要一个简单的念头，就可以让塞塔拉家族的人死在我脚下。这种感觉，就仿佛我的胸膛里有第二颗心脏在跳动，它会征服一切能够触碰到它的人。遗憾的是，只有奥赛罗家族那些接受了部分圣仪的人，才能感觉到这样的力量。从现在开始，每个孩子在诞生的时候，都会得到他们的圣仪。这样一来，再也没有哪个家族能与伟大的奥赛罗家族相提并论。”
languages.original_text:
"House Orsellio need not know what is taking place here. The Navigators are frightened enough by its power as it is. The last experiment left three from the Setthala clan without a shred of reason. Empty shells will bring no glory to House Orsellio or its lesser branch... We shall carry on.
***
At last, we have managed to implant the artefact in subjects who can wield its power. Perhaps all the Navigators who perished in the agonising torrent of energy were merely a symptom of our decline. I am tired of counting the dead. The weak have no place among those who have harnessed the Atlas. Their abilities have grown manifold and become significantly easier to control and more effective at resisting the ruinous influence of the warp.
***
It is all or nothing. Today is the day when my work is completed and the Starway Atlas takes its final form! The Setthalas have already undergone the operation, all that's left is... me. The Atlas that controls them all... Today, I become the greatest Novator in the history of House Orsellio — or I turn to nothing.
***
This power is beyond compare. All it took was a whim to make the wretched Setthalas fall dead at my feet. It is as if I have a second heart beating in my chest, subjugating any with the ability to touch it. How regrettable it is that this power only extends to those Orsellio Navigators who have accepted a piece of the Atlas within themselves. From now on, all children will be gifted with one at their initiation. And there will be no one who can match our greatness."

traits.locale_text:
“奥塞罗家族不需要了解这里发生过的事情，所有导航者都被它的力量吓坏了。最后的这场试验，三个来自塞塔拉氏族的人毫无理由地丧了命。不过，死人是无法为奥塞罗家族带来荣耀的……我们必须继续下去。
***
到了最后，我们成功地将那件造物植入了能够驾驭力量的人身上。无数导航者在痛苦的能量洪流中丧生，或许这些人的死亡是我们家族衰落的预兆。我已经懒得再数死了多少人，我们必将成为圣仪的主人，那些弱者在我们之中没有立足之地。至于那些成功驾驭圣仪的人，他们各个方面的能力都得到了强化。他们对力量的掌控变得更加出色，对亚空间邪恶力量的抗性也变得更强。
***
孤注一掷的时候到了，成败在此一举。我的工作终于完成了，今天就是群星圣仪诞生的日子！塞塔拉氏族的人已经完成了手术，接下来就只剩下……我自己了。我的圣仪将会控制所有的圣仪……今天，我会成为奥塞罗家族有史以来最伟大的大族长……又或许，所有的努力都会功败垂成。
***
这样的力量实在是无可比拟，只要一个简单的念头，就可以让塞塔拉家族的人死在我脚下。这种感觉，就仿佛我的胸膛里有第二颗心脏在跳动，它会征服一切能够触碰到它的人。遗憾的是，只有奥塞罗家族那些接受了部分圣仪的人，才能感觉到这样的力量。从现在开始，每个孩子在诞生的时候，都会得到他们的圣仪。这样一来，再也没有哪个家族能与伟大的奥赛罗家族相提并论。”

languages.text:
"Haus Orsellio muss nicht wissen, was hier vor sich geht. Die Navigatoren sind schon verängstigt genug. Beim letzten Experiment haben drei vom Setthala-Clan den Verstand verloren, restlos. Leere Hüllen bringen weder dem Haus Orsellio noch seinem niederen Zweig Ruhm ein ... Wir machen weiter.
***
Es ist uns endlich gelungen, das Artefakt Versuchspersonen zu implantieren, die seine Macht dann nutzen können. Vielleicht waren alle Navigatoren, die durch den quälenden Energieschwall ums Leben gekommen sind, lediglich ein Symptom unseres Niedergangs. Ich bin es leid, die Toten zu zählen. Die Schwachen haben keinen Platz unter jenen, die den Atlas beherrschen. Ihre Fähigkeiten haben sich immens entwickelt, sind nun deutlich leichter zu kontrollieren und sehr viel effektiver darin, dem schädlichen Einfluss des Warps zu widerstehen.
***
Es heißt alles oder nichts. Heute ist der Tag, an dem mein Werk endlich vollendet wird und der Atlas der Sternenwege seine endgültige Gestalt annimmt! Die Setthalas haben die Operation bereits durchlaufen, es fehlt nur noch einer ... ich. Der Atlas, der sie alle kontrolliert ... Heute werde ich zum größten Novator in der Geschichte des Hauses Orsellio — oder ich werde zu nichts.
***
Diese Macht ist unvergleichlich. Es war nur ein kurzer Impuls einer Laune nötig, schon lagen die elenden Setthalas tot zu meinen Füßen. Es ist, als würde ein zweites Herz in meiner Brust schlagen, das jeden unterwirft, der es berühren kann. Wie bedauerlich, dass diese Kraft sich nur auf jene Orsellio-Navigatoren erstreckt, die ein Stück des Atlas in sich selbst akzeptiert haben. Von nun werden alle Kinder bei ihrer Initiation ein solches Stück als Geschenk erhalten. Und es wird niemanden geben, der mir das Wasser reichen kann."

"House Orsellio need not know what is taking place here. The Navigators are frightened enough by its power as it is. The last experiment left three from the Setthala clan without a shred of reason. Empty shells will bring no glory to House Orsellio or its lesser branch... We shall carry on.
***
At last, we have managed to implant the artefact in subjects who can wield its power. Perhaps all the Navigators who perished in the agonising torrent of energy were merely a symptom of our decline. I am tired of counting the dead. The weak have no place among those who have harnessed the Atlas. Their abilities have grown manifold and become significantly easier to control and more effective at resisting the ruinous influence of the warp.

***
This power is beyond compare. All it took was a whim to make the wretched Setthalas fall dead at my feet. It is as if I have a second heart beating in my chest, subjugating any with the ability to touch it. How regrettable it is that this power only extends to those Orsellio Navigators who have accepted a piece of the Atlas within themselves. From now on, all children will be gifted with one at their initiation. And there will be no one who can match our greatness."

***

Es ist, als würde ein zweites Herz in meiner Brust schlagen, das jeden unterwirft, der es berühren kann. Wie bedauerlich, dass diese Kraft sich nur auf jene Orsellio-Navigatoren erstreckt, die ein Stück des Atlas in sich selbst akzeptiert haben. Von nun werden alle Kinder bei ihrer Initiation ein solches Stück als Geschenk erhalten. Und es wird niemanden geben, der mir das Wasser reichen kann."

languages.text:
«La casa Orsellio no necesita saber lo que está ocurriendo aquí. Los navegantes ya están lo bastante asustados por este poder. El último experimento costó la cordura a tres miembros del clan Setthala. Unos cascarones vacíos no aportarán ninguna gloria a la casa Orsellio ni a su rama menor... Hemos de continuar.
***
Por fin hemos conseguido implantar el artefacto en sujetos de prueba capaces de utilizar su poder. Quizá todos los navegantes que perecieron en el agónico torrente de energía no fueran más que un síntoma de nuestro declive. Me he cansado de contar las bajas. Los débiles no tienen cabida entre aquellos que dominan el Atlas. Sus poderes se han multiplicado, ahora son mucho más fáciles de controlar y más eficaces resistiendo el pernicioso influjo de la disformidad.
***
Es todo o nada. ¡En el día de hoy se completará mi trabajo y el Atlas de las Vías Estelares adquirirá su forma definitiva! Los Setthala ya se han sometido a la intervención, lo último que queda por hacer... soy yo. El Atlas los controla a todos... Hoy me convertiré en el mayor Novator en la historia de la casa Orsellio, o no quedará nada de mí.
***
Este poder es incomparable. No hizo falta más que un pensamiento para que esos infelices de los Setthala cayesen muertos a mis pies. Es como si un segundo corazón palpitase en mi pecho, subyugando a quienes poseen la capacidad de contactar con él. Es una pena que semejante poder solo afecte a los navegantes de la casa Orsellio que han aceptado un fragmento del Atlas en su interior. A partir de ahora, todos los niños recibirán uno como obsequio durante su ceremonia de iniciación. Y no habrá nadie a la altura de nuestra grandeza».

***

I am tired of counting the dead. The weak have no place among those who have harnessed the Atlas. Their abilities have grown manifold and become significantly easier to control and more effective at resisting the ruinous influence of the warp.

languages.text:
"Burada olup biteni Orsellio Hanesi'nin bilmesinin lüzumu yok. Hele ki bunun gücü, hâlihazırda Rotacıları dehşete düşürmüşken. Son deneyimizin sonucunda Setthala klanının üç mensubunda zerre akıl kalmadı. İçi boş kabukların, Orsellio Hanesi'nin veya önemsiz bir soyunun görkemine katkısı olamaz. Çalışmalarımıza devam edeceğiz.
***
Nihayet eseri, gücünü kullanabilecek deneklerin içine yerleştirmeyi başardık. Belki de ızdırap verici bir enerji selinde can veren o Rotacıların hepsi, aslında sadece gerilediğimizin işaretlerinden biriydi. Ölüleri saymaktan bıktım usandım. Atlas'tan istifade edebilenlerin arasında güçsüzlere yer yok. Atlas'ı kullanılabilenlerin hünerleri kat kat artmakla birlikte hâkimiyet kurmaları da kolaylaştı. Ayrıca öteboyutun yıkıcı nüfuzuna direnmekte daha etkililer.
***
Ya herrü ya merrü. Bugün çalışmalarımın sonuna geleceğiz. Yıldız Yolu Atlası, son hâlini alacak! Setthala soyu ameliyata girdi, geriye sadece ben kaldım... Atlas, hepsini kontrol ediyor... Bugün ya Orsellio Hanesi'nin tarihindeki gelmiş geçmiş en büyük Rota Reisi olacağım ya da hiçliğe kavuşacağım.
***
Bu gücün eşi benzeri yok. Sefil Setthala soyunun ayaklarımın dibinde kıvrılıp ölmesi için bunu arzu etmem yetti. Sanki göğsümde atan ikinci bir kalp daha var, ona temas edebilen herkesin itaat etmesini sağlıyor. Ne yazık ki bu güç, sadece kendi içlerine Atlas'ın bir parçasını almayı kabul eden Orsellio Rotacılarınca kullanılabiliyor. Bugünden itibaren bize katıldıklarında tüm çocuklara bunlardan bir tane bahşedilecek. Böylece bizimle aşık atabilecek kimse kalmayacak."
languages.original_text:
"House Orsellio need not know what is taking place here. The Navigators are frightened enough by its power as it is. The last experiment left three from the Setthala clan without a shred of reason. Empty shells will bring no glory to House Orsellio or its lesser branch... We shall carry on.
***
At last, we have managed to implant the artefact in subjects who can wield its power. Perhaps all the Navigators who perished in the agonising torrent of energy were merely a symptom of our decline. I am tired of counting the dead. The weak have no place among those who have harnessed the Atlas. The Atlas that controls them all... Today, I become the greatest Novator in the history of House Orsellio — or I turn to nothing.
***
This power is beyond compare. All it took was a whim to make the wretched Setthalas fall dead at my feet. It is as if I have a second heart beating in my chest, subjugating any with the ability to touch it. How regrettable it is that this power only extends to those Orsellio Navigators who have accepted a piece of the Atlas within themselves. From now on, all children will be gifted with one at their initiation. And there will be no one who can match our greatness."

traits.locale_text:
"Burada olup biteni Orsellio Hanesi'nin bilmesinin lüzumu yok. Zaten hâlihazırda Rotacılar bunun gücünden dehşete kapılmış durumda. Son deneyimizin sonucunda Setthala klanından üçünde zerre akıl kalmadı. İçi boş kabukların, Orsellio Hanesi'nin veya önemsiz bir soyunun görkemine bir katkısı olamaz. Yolumuza devam edeceğiz.
***
Nihayet eseri, gücünü kullanabilecek deneklerin içine implant ekmeyi başardık. Belki de ızdırap verici bir enerji selinde can veren o Rotacıların hepsi, aslında sadece gerilememizin alametlerinden biriydi. Ölüleri saymaktan bıktım usandım. Atlas'tan istifade edebilenlerin arasında güçsüzlere yer yok. Atlas'ı kullanılabilenlerin hünerleri kat kat artmakla birlikte hünerlerine hâkim olmaları da kolaylaştı. Ayrıca öteboyutun yıkıcı nüfuzuna direnmekte de daha etkililer.
***

Bugün ya Orsellio Hanesi'nin tarihinde gelmiş geçmiş en büyük Rota Reisi olacağım ya da hiçliğe kavuşacağım.
***
Bu gücün eşi benzeri yok. Sefil Setthala soyunun ayaklarımın dibinde kıvrılıp ölmesini sağlamak için bunu arzu etmem yetti. Sanki göğsümde atan ikinci bir kalp daha var; temas edebilen herkesin itaat etmesini sağlıyor. Ne yazık ki bu güç, sadece kendi içlerine Atlas'ın bir parçasını almayı kabul eden Orsellio Rotacılarını etkileyebiliyor. Bugünden itibaren bize katıldıklarında tüm çocuklara bunlardan bir tane bahşedilecek. Böylece bizimle aşık atabilecek kimse kalmayacak."
